by High Temperature Spectroscopies

front.div:
The combination of ^'A! NMR expriments and Molecular Dynamics simulation confirms the exis-
tence of penta-coordinated Aluminium in several molten aluminium oxides. In the case of fluoroalumi-
nate molten salts, NMR and Raman spectroscopies provide complementary approaches leading to a
structural description in term of AI F 4 , AIF5" and AlFfi species.
